Returns: A ViewHolder for the Row's View.
Parameters: ViewGroup: The parent View for the Row's view holder.
createRowViewHolder(android.view.ViewGro.Description: Called to create a ViewHolder object for a Row. Subclasses will override this method to return a different concrete ViewHolder object.

isUsingDefaultSelectEffect().Description: Returns true if this RowPresenter is using the default dimming effect. A subclass may (most likely) return false and override @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#onSelectLevelChanged_E@.

AbstractMediaListHeaderPresenter().Description: Constructor used for creating an abstract media-list header presenter. The styling for this presenter is extracted from Context of parent in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractMediaListHeaderPresenter#createRowViewHolder_E@.

Parameters: int: The ARGB color used to set as the header text background color.
setBackgroundColor(int).Description: Sets the background color for the row views within the playlist. If this is not set, a default color, defaultBrandColor, from theme is used. This defaultBrandColor defaults to android:attr/colorPrimary on v21, if it's specified.

ClassDesc: Abstract presenter class for rendering the header for a list of media items in a playlist. The presenter creates a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractMediaListHeaderPresenter#ViewHolder_E@ for the TextView holding the header text. Subclasses of this class must override @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractMediaListHeaderPresenter#onBindMediaListHeaderViewHolder_E@ in order to bind their header text to the media list header view. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractMediaItemPresenter_E@ can be used in conjunction with this presenter in order to display a playlist with a header view.
